title: Did Rudy Gobert Set the Market For Kevin Durant?
description:
Chris and Seerat begin by discussing the recent news of Zion Williamson’s deal with the New Orleans Pelicans. Then they touch on the Rudy Gobert trade and its potential impact on the current Kevin Durant situation.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Producer: Devon Manze
